Package jchain.bc

Class Block

  • java.lang.Object
    • jchain.bc.Block
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Hashable
    public class Block
extends java.lang.Object
implements Hashable
    Implements a Block in a blockchain system.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int BLOCK_SIZE  
      static short MAX_TXNS  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Block​(java.lang.String prevBlockHash, java.util.Collection<Transaction> txList)
      Returns an instance of a Block object containing the indicated transactions and linked to a previous block using the given previous block hash.
      Null transactions in the collection are NOT added to the block, they are instead skipped over and a warning is printed to standard out.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String computeHash()
      Computes a SHA-256 double hash for the block and returns it.
      The hash consists of the following components: The magic number constant. The transaction count. The MerkleTree root hash. The block version number. The timestamp when the block was created. The number of bits comprising all of the transactions. The nonce. The previous block hash.
      boolean contains​(java.lang.String txHash)
      Determines if the block contains the indicated transaction.
      boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
      Determines if an object is equal to this Block or not.
      Header getBlockHeader()
      Returns the block header.
      java.lang.String getHash()
      Returns the block hash.
      Transaction getTransaction​(java.lang.String txHash)
      Trys to get a transaction from the block with the given transaction hash.
      int getTransactionCount()
      Returns the Transaction count.
      int hashCode()
      Determines a Java hashCode for this Block.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a String representation of this Block.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Block

        public Block​(java.lang.String prevBlockHash,
             java.util.Collection<Transaction> txList)
        Returns an instance of a Block object containing the indicated transactions and linked to a previous block using the given previous block hash.
        Null transactions in the collection are NOT added to the block, they are instead skipped over and a warning is printed to standard out.
        Parameters:
        prevBlockHash - The lead blocks hash.
        txList - A collection of transactions.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the txList is null or empty. If the prevBlockHash is null or empty.

    • Method Detail

      • getBlockHeader

        Returns the block header.
        Returns:
        The blocks header.

      • getHash

        public java.lang.String getHash()
        Returns the block hash.
        Specified by:
        getHash in interface Hashable
        Returns:
        The blocks hash.

      • getTransactionCount

        public int getTransactionCount()
        Returns the Transaction count.
        Returns:
        The number of Transactions contained in the block.

      • computeHash

        public java.lang.String computeHash()
        Computes a SHA-256 double hash for the block and returns it.
        The hash consists of the following components:
        1. The magic number constant.
        2. The transaction count.
        3. The MerkleTree root hash.
        4. The block version number.
        5. The timestamp when the block was created.
        6. The number of bits comprising all of the transactions.
        7. The nonce.
        8. The previous block hash.
        Specified by:
        computeHash in interface Hashable
        Returns:
        A SHA-256 double hash as a hexstring.

      • contains

        public boolean contains​(java.lang.String txHash)
        Determines if the block contains the indicated transaction.
        Parameters:
        txHash - The transaction hash.
        Returns:
        True if the block contains a Transaction with the indicated hash, false otherwise.

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
        Determines if an object is equal to this Block or not.
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        obj - An object to determine equality against.
        Returns:
        True if the Object is a block and has the same hash as this Block, false otherwise.

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Determines a Java hashCode for this Block.
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A 'unique' hashCode for this Block.

      • getTransaction

        public Transaction getTransaction​(java.lang.String txHash)
        Trys to get a transaction from the block with the given transaction hash.
        Parameters:
        txHash - A SHA-256 double hash hexstring.
        Returns:
        A Transaction object if it exists, null otherwise.
